title: FRQ Score
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria and/or examples, and to score the response.

For Task A, the response must correctly identify the country with the lowest level of trust from 2016-2021.

For Task B, the response must correctly describe the change in the level of trust in Mexico from 2017-2021.

For Task C, the response must correctly describe stability.

For Task D, the response must correctly draw a conclusion about Chinaâ€™s policies in maintaining political stability.

For Task E, the response must correctly explain what the data in the graph implies about corruption in Russia.
descriptions: The response accomplishes none of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes one of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes two of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes three of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes four of the tasks set by the question.
The response accomplishes five of the tasks set by the question.
